Text:
Do people actually listen to this racist homophobe ? 
It is because of Nationalist scum like him that the Norway massacre happened.

Hey Pagansun - Obviously you don't listen to Dr. Savage.. He's FAR from a racist and can care less what men or women do in their bedrooms. You should stop listening to the left-wing AND right-wing loonies and listen and think for yourself.. Maybe you'll learn something
Thank you swabbie59. Greetings form Norway! Michael Savage is brilliant.
